import React, { useState } from "react"; const Index = () => { const [activeStatus, setActiveStatus] = useState(1); return (
  • setActiveStatus(1)} className={activeStatus === 1 ? "text-sm text-indigo-700 flex flex-col justify-between border-indigo-700 pt-3 rounded-t mr-10 font-normal" : "text-sm text-gray-600 py-3 mr-10 font-normal cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-800"}> {activeStatus === 1 ? "Topics" : "Topics"} {activeStatus === 1 &&
    }
  • setActiveStatus(2)} className={activeStatus === 2 ? "text-sm text-indigo-700 flex flex-col justify-between border-indigo-700 pt-3 rounded-t mr-10 font-normal" : "text-sm text-gray-600 py-3 mr-10 font-normal cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-800"}> {activeStatus === 2 ? "Courses" : "Courses"} {activeStatus === 2 &&
    }
); }; export default Index;
